price: (Huud) ni jedhe: “Beekumsi (adabbittii) Allaah bira jira. Ani waanuman ittiin ergame qofan isinitti geessa. Garuu ani ummata wollaaloo ta’uun isin arga.”
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَأُبَلِّغُكُم مَّآ أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِهِۦ وَلَٰكِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰكُمۡ قَوۡمٗا تَجۡهَلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā al-ʿil'mu ʿinda al-lahi wa-uballighukum mā ur'sil'tu bihi walākinnī arākum qawman tajhalūna
